entry.title: Getting Started
entry.content:
Welcome to MakeMyMails! To learn more about MakeMyMails , read the Overview which contains a feature list, installation guide and other general information. Further reading includes Frequently Asked Questions.

Table of Contents

  1. Overview
    • Introduction
    • Features 1.Email Channel 2.Email variables 3.Email Template: Create and save. 4.Scheduling mails 5.Tracking emails
  2. Using MakeMyMails
    • Login
    • Spreadsheets
    • Email templates
    • Scheduling mails
    • Email Tracker
  3. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Any issues? Want to add a new feature? Drop an email at mittal.pranjal@gmail.com and we will get back to you.
